commands: execute as @s[tag=satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false
execute as @s[tag=!satsu.iron.man.enable.armor,scores={satsu.iron.man.animation.armor=1}] run tag @s remove sentinel.false

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

enabling.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0.1..0.5] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID
execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.mask 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.mask

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=1}] run tag @s add energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run tag @s remove energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.arms.set

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand=2..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.uni.beam.hand 0

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.flight.set
